de.learnlib.logging

Class LearnLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.logging.Logger
      • de.learnlib.logging.LearnLogger

  • public class LearnLogger
extends Logger
    LearnLib specific logger. Adds some methods to Logger for logging artifacts specific to learning.
    Author:
    falkhowar

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class java.util.logging.Logger

        global, GLOBAL_LOGGER_NAME

    • Method Detail

      • getLogger

        public static LearnLogger getLogger(String name)
        get an instance of a logger for name. assumes that there is no ordinary logger of the same name.
        Parameters:
        name -
        Returns:

      • getLogger

        public static LearnLogger getLogger(Class<?> clazz)
        Convenience method for easing the common practice of using a class name as the name for the logger. Calling this method is equivalent to 
         LearnLogger.getLogger(clazz.getName())
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class from which to retrieve the name
        Returns:
        the logger for the given class name

      • defaultSetup

        @Deprecated
public static void defaultSetup()
        Deprecated. The use of this method is discouraged as it interferes with (proper) file-based or class-based configuration of logging.
        remove all handlers of root logger and add a console hander with LLConsoleFormatter instead.

      • setGlobalFilter

        public static void setGlobalFilter(Filter f)
